Announcing Castle Arcadium (or: Where Did The Games Go?)

Welcome to Plasmaworks, the game publisher and technology engineering company. If you’re looking for our games, they’re alive and well at Castle Arcadium, our digital entertainment brand!

A few months ago we decided that we were just appearing too schizophrenic – are we a game developer that also writes languages and does contract work, or are we a technology developer that dabbles in games?

Well, both and neither. And it doesn’t really matter to ”us” – we know what we are – but the brand becomes diluted. Thus we’ve spun off Castle Arcadium as our dedicated games brand and we’re refocusing Plasmaworks as a developer-centric, tech heavy hangout.Â  It’s still in transition – bear with us!
